h3.a: USD 303 playgrounds, outside basketball courts, tennis courts, and ball fields closed to public due to COVID-19 virus

div.p: By order of County Health Officials and in conjunction with the USD 303 BOE and Executive Order 20-16, all USD 303 playgrounds, the outside basketball courts, tennis courts, baseball field, and football field are closed to the Public due to COVID-19 virus concerns. The track will remain open for now. Patrons are expected to abide by the 10 person, 6 feet apart guidance while using the track. Patrons that do not abide by . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about USD 303 playgrounds, outside basketball courts, tennis courts, and ball fields closed to public due to COVID-19 virus
Read more about USD 303 Continuous Learning Plan

h3.a: Response to Governor Kelly's executive order closing school buildings for the remainder of 19-20 school year

div.p:
Please be assured that the continuation of education will occur for all USD 303 students. While buildings are closed, school is not over. As we develop plans and gather more information, we will share that out.
USD 303 Response

a.aria-label: Read more about Response to Governor Kelly's executive order closing school buildings for the remainder of 19-20 school year
